document_data.name: Kylia
document_data.mainbody: '''Kylia''' was a [[rock gnome]] illusionist who served as a messenger and informant for [[Laeral Silverhand]] in [[Skullport]], in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: She dressed in an all-red, hooded robe, and wore a golden necklace.
document_data.Personality: She had a very pleasant personality, to the point that many of her foes underestimated her. Kylia also had a flair for the dramatic, and was especially fond of appearing and disappearing in a puff of smoke.
document_data.Possessions: Kylia owned several [[magic]]al items, among them a ''[[robe of eyes]]'', a ''[[staff of thunder and lightning]]'', a pair of ''[[bracers of defense]]'', and a ''[[ring of gargoyles]]''.
